courses.name: Software Testing
courses.description: Systematic approaches to software testing, theoretical foundations, and the current state of practice. Techniques and tools that improve software testing and overall development skills.

courses.name: Database Systems
courses.description: Database analysis, design, administration, implementation, hierarchical, network relational models; data sublanguages; query facilities.

courses.name: Senior Design Project II
courses.description: Advanced project, formal report, and oral presentation.

courses.name: Senior Design Project I
courses.description: Advanced project, seminar series, formal written report, and oral presentation.

courses.name: Modern CyberSecurity
courses.description: Contemporary cyber-security issues; techniques, programs, tools and methods for examining contemporary cyber-attacks and cyber-defenses.

courses.name: Computer Networks and the Internet
courses.description: Principles of communications, local area networks, communication protocols, TCP/IP, and the Internet.

courses.name: Embedded Systems and Machine Learning
courses.description: Machine learning for embedded computing systems; hardware/software optimizations for machine learning; hardware accelerators for deep learning; data reuse and sharing techniques; memory and network design for machine learning acceleration; anomaly detection and adversarial learning; advanced applications of machine learning in embedded applications.

courses.name: Operating Systems
courses.description: Introduction to operating systems including memory organization, I/O control, multitasking, process control, coordination, and resource management.

courses.name: Introduction to Communications Principles
courses.description: Basic concepts in design and analysis of communication systems.

courses.name: Linear System Analysis II
courses.description: Laplace and Z transforms, applications to modulation, filtering and sampling, state space representation.

courses.name: Computer Organization and Architecture
courses.description: CPU design; microarchitecture; data path and control path; pipelining; memory system; I/O system; program optimization by system software/hardware.

courses.name: Software Engineering
courses.description: Principles, concepts, and techniques associated with team-based development of large, complex software systems. Topics include teamwork, configuration management, project management, requirements engineering, and systematic testing techniques. Use software tools in the context of a Scrum-based Agile development project

courses.name: Systems Security
courses.description: Computer and system security, authentication, access control, malicious software, and software security.

courses.name: Introduction to Project Practices
courses.description: Development of project skills and professionalism within the electrical and computer engineering (ECE) discipline through individual and group project work guided by ECE industry leaders.

courses.name: Linear System Analysis I
courses.description: Continuous and discrete time signals and systems representations in time and frequency domain; time convolution.

courses.name: Digital System Design
courses.description: State machines with PLAs as controllers and small computers; timing and race elimination considerations; state and microprogramming implementation.

courses.name: Intro to Ordinary Differential Equations
courses.description: First and second order equations, series, Laplace transforms, linear algebra, eigenvalues, first order systems of equations, numerical techniques.

courses.name: Introdction to Microcontrollers and IoT
courses.description: Microprocessor organization, Internet of Things (IoT) platforms, microprocessor coding using C and assembly language, I/O techniques, real-time interfaces, and applications.

courses.name: Algorithms-Theory and Practice
courses.description: Analysis, design, implementation and applications of algorithms.
